fields_of_interest: Education and training, Research and innovation, Transport

goals__remit: EuroUSC Italia is active in the field of non-military RPAS (or “drones”) offering training for remote pilots and related instructors, legal and safety risk assessment and mitigation, support to manufacturers and operators to prepare manuals and to comply with regulations. In particular it has a world leading role for higher education courses on the international civil regulation of drones and civil aviation regulation in general.
